comment: Heres another example of AH's 'basic hypnosis tricks'. You simply suggest that something is so. That something exists. You are telling people it is there. In reality it is not. Humans are easily tricked by a simple power of suggestion. Especially when you plan and stage the scene, with things just happening out of sight. In this case for example, when witnesses arrive, she plants the physiological seed of an event that never occurred. The clever part is. The witness now has to 'repeat' what AH said in a testimony, so it becomes 'vocal evidence'. Another form of a lie, that is transposed to a 3rd party, for that 3rd party to repeat. Its an incredibly manipulative technique. One that she will have been using on her friends as well. She tells Rocky and Drew 'this happened'. They repeat that information. But did they witness it?. Or was something just presented a certain way. The con requires everyone to participate. Including the public eye. And we are all pawns in the AH con.
